text: Israelia Hebronɨn nguibar ekiam ko Jatirɨn nguibar ekiam isa, Aronɨn adarazigh anɨngi. Hebron, a nguibar ekiar gumazamiziba arɨ mangɨ mongamim.6:57 Nɨ Josua sapta 20ɨn gan. Egha me uaghan nguibar ekiar igharazir maba sara Aronɨn adarazigh anɨngi. Nguibar ekiar kabar ziabar kara: Lipna ko Estemoa ko,
